item.description:
The wx looks good for an Ice Cream Sundae the size of Texas. But, we're all a little rusty flying from the metars, so let's not fly to Texas....

A casual joy ride to AFN could work.... Yup, way out to Jaffrey.. Unless someone wants a better idea... I figure lets get back on our horses...er...ahm... planes, and GET FLYING again...

Thursday night could be the last night in June to log an hour or so....

See ya then, and please RSVP if you can...

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: ICE CREAM or Lobster Rolls, This Thursday!
